general.label: General
general.comment: If you don't have a Temando account, you can Sign Up immediately.

sandbox.label: Sandbox
sandbox.comment: If set to "Yes", the sandbox (testing) service will be used (usually set to "No" on a live site)

payment_type.label: Payment Type
payment_type.comment: If choosing "credit", please ensure you have sufficient credit in your Temando account

show_carrier_names.label: Show Carrier Names
show_carrier_names.comment: Controls whether carrier names are shown to the customer

show_product_estimate.label: Show Estimate Shipping on Product Page
show_product_estimate.comment: Set to yes to enable a shipping estimation widget on the product page.

show_name_time.label: Show Transit Type and Time
show_name_time.comment: Set to no to hide transit type and time from the customer in the front-end. This information will still appear in the back-end.

status.label: Insurance
status.comment:
Disabled - This option is unavailable to users.
Optional - The option is presented during checkout.
Mandatory - Insurance must be added to all orders.

status.label: Carbon Offset
status.comment:
Disabled - This option is unavailable to users.
Optional - The option is presented during checkout.
Mandatory - Carbon offsets are added to all orders.

delivery_options.label: Show Delivery Options
delivery_options.comment: Show extra delivery options to customers during checkout process?

allow_pobox.label: Allow PO Box Deliveries
allow_pobox.comment: Restrict shipping to PO Box addresses.

allow_pobox_message.label: PO Box Error Message
allow_pobox_message.comment: The error message displayed when delivery to PO Box address is restricted.

shipment_order_statuses.label: Order Status
shipment_order_statuses.comment:
Use CTRL + click to select multiple statuses
Refers to Temando - Manage Shipments panel.
Shipments linked to an order with selected status are NOT displayed on Temando - Manage Shipments grid.

sameday_carriers.label: Same Day Carriers
sameday_carriers.comment:
Selected carriers will be prioritised and marked as "Same Day" within the Manage Shipments page.
Use CTRL + click to select multiple carriers

express_carriers.label: Express Carriers
express_carriers.comment:
Selected carriers will be prioritised and marked as "Express" within the Manage Shipments page.
Use CTRL + click to select multiple carriers

error_process.label: Error from Temando processing
error_process.comment: Show error message to customer from Temando, custom message, or show flat rate shipping method.

error_message.label: Custom Error Message
error_message.comment: Custom error message displayed to customer instead of Temando error.

method.label: Pricing Method
method.comment:
Free Shipping - no charge to customer.
Fixed Price / Flat Rate - customer always pays the amount set in "Shipping Price" below.
Rule Engine - condition/action driven shipping methods

measure.label: Measure Unit
measure.comment: The units used for product measurements

weight.label: Weight Unit
weight.comment: The units used for product weights

defaults.label: Packaging
defaults.comment: Default values will be used for all products that do not have product specific dimensions & packaging information configured.

consolidation.label: Consolidation
consolidation.comment: Use packaging details defined in Magento or automated consolidation via Temando API.

temando.label: Temando
temando.comment:
The settings for Temando have moved.
Please check in the menu on the left for "Temando Settings" under the "Sales" section.

title.label: Title
title.comment: The heading above the list of Temando shipping methods during checkout

free_shipping_enable.label: Free Shipping with Minimum Order Amount

free_shipping_subtotal.label: Minimum Order Amount for Free Shipping

allowed_methods.label: Allowed Carriers
allowed_methods.comment: Use CTRL + click to select multiple carriers
